a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindicationsLogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotavirus contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotavirus contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindicationsLogic

a:s.a:s: "Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1"

'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.'
"Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 2"
'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.'

when.name: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.

when.name: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 2

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.

a:s.a:s: "Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1"
'Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.'
"Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 2"
'Client has spina bifida, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.'
"Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 3"
'Client has bladder exstrophy, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.'
"Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 4"
'Client has chronic gastrointestinal disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.'
"Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 5"
'Client has acute gastroenteritis, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.'
"Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 6"
'Client has moderate to severe fever, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.'

when.name: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1

then.value: Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.

when.name: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 6
